title: My account was banned today for "botting?", Is there a way to get my account back?
body: I started playing this game over a year ago, I have over 500 games, I have spent over $200-300 on skins and ingame purchases, I have never used "botting?" (I'm not sure what that is yet). Its listed as a third party program, which I haven't used. Is there a way to recover my account?

replies.body:
Okay, went through the other two people. Time to go through your [match history](https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA1/2233181853699008) to check how believable your claim is.

If you scroll down, once again, look at all those TT games with ghost/heal. On your last TT game, 9/28/19 you suddenly decided you were done with playing for a while. Then there's a large gap of playtime despite the marathon you've been running, until 10/10/19. 

At that point you toss ghost/heal out with the bathwater along with any pretense that you didn't know how to play and jump directly into Ranked, channeling your sudden skill as a Victor main.

After looking at that sort of pattern yet again I'm skeptical to believe your claim.

Skeptical is.. putting it too nicely.

What I'm skeptical of is why there's so many **obviously** botted accounts coming to complain this banwave - normally we see more of the less obvious than this time. Are these all players who are part of some website that sells account and trying to get their website's accounts unbanned to keep in business or what?

> [{quoted}](name=rujitra,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7tnkLVv8,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2020-01-10T01:38:37.811+0000)

Are these all players who are part of some website that sells account and trying to get their website's accounts unbanned to keep in business or what?

The ban wave could have been larger than normal, because some of these accounts had the suspicious patterns several months ago.

It's nice to see 'proof' that they're doing something about it. Rujitra's right, let's call it like it is, these guys are bastards.

They bought bot accounts, violating essentially every rule and reasonable standard of decency.

what bot is "less obvious"?
they all have (or had) a 24/7 speedrun of TT games with the same champs runes and summoner spells.

Then, suddenly you played ranked. You play with an incredibly increased amount of skill.

https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA1/2233181853699008

I feel proud to say this. But the board members always take a good look at reports on botting, griefing and trolling based on match history and the games played. Sometimes even watching the recordings and posting relevant clips. Its one thing to buy a bot-leveled account. But its on an entirely different level to come here pretending to be innocent. Do you not have any guilty conscience?
